description: The premium flavors of cotton candy that Pure Fluff Co. are puffin' up sure are quite dandy! Just like you, your favorite childhood treat is all grown up. Made with organic cane sugar, and available in a variety of artisanal homemade flavors, Pure Fluff Co is just the sort of cotton candy you've been hoping for. Popping up all over downtown Charleston, Pure Fluff Co is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth.
name: Pure Fluff Co.
